sections.description: A simple dummy contact form plugin for testing purposes.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the `dummy-contact-form` folder to `/wp-content/plugins/`.
2. Activate via 'Plugins' menu.
3. Update as needed.
sections.frequently_asked_questions:
= How do I modify the settings =
There are no settings for this plugin.
sections.changelog:
2.11.0

  • Fixed: minor bug fixes

2.10.0

  • Initial release with basic contact form
